product.title: 2019 Open Box True GDM-49F Glass Door Merchandiser Freezer with LED Interior Lighting

body-html.p: The GDM-49F-HC is a 54-1/8" wide, ENERGY STAR certified two-section insulated and self-contained refrigerated freezer merchandiser from True. This freezer comes in a black powder coated steel exterior. There are 2 triple-pane thermal glass hinged doors on this ENERGY STAR certified two-section insulated and self-contained refrigerated freezer merchandiser. The freezer also has LED interior lighting.

This ENERGY STAR certified two-section insulated and self-contained refrigerated freezer merchandiser has 8 adjustable, heavy duty, PVC coated wire shelves and it has a white interior. This unit also comes with a stainless steel floor for easier cleaning. The entire cabinet of this ENERGY STAR certified two-section insulated and self-contained refrigerated freezer merchandiser has foamed-in-place, high density, polyurethane insulation. The self-contained refrigeration on this ENERGY STAR certified two-section insulated and self-contained refrigerated freezer merchandiser uses environmentally friendly R290 hydrocarbon refrigerant which has zero ozone depletion potential (ODP).

product.title: Advance Tabco KSLAG-240 30" x 24" 16 ga Work Table w/ Undershelf & 430 Series Stainless Steel Top, 5" Backsplash

body-html.p: The Advance Tabco KSLAG-240 work table has a top surface that is reinforced and kept level by two galvanized hat channels. It is constructed of 430 series, 16-gauge stainless steel, making it durable and rust resistant. Because higher gauge metals are thinner than lower gauges, the 430 series stainless steel has little nickel content and doesn't resist corrosion as well as 300 series stainless steel; however, it is great for extending countertops. The 5-inch backsplash on the rear contains spills and messes to keep walls clean. For safety, a rolled rim on the front eliminates sharp edges.

The table's square bend sides enable it to be placed flush against equipment and walls. The top has been sound deadened to reduce noise while in use. Two galvanized hat channels reinforce the top surface to ensure it remains level, and welded gussets provide support to the hat channels. The 18-gauge undershelf can be adjusted, and it's secured by aluminum die-cast clamps instead of nuts and bolts. To keep the Advance Tabco KSLAG-240 work table level on uneven ground, bullet feet on the stainless steel legs are adjustable.

A rolled-rim edge reduces sharpness on the front of the table, and square ends enable the unit to be placed directly against walls and counters. A 5-inch backsplash on the rear of the top prevents leaks and spills from damaging walls. The Advance Tabco KSLAG-242 work table has tubular stainless steel legs with adjustable bullet feet to ensure stability on uneven floors.

product.title: Alto-Shaam 1000-BQ2/128 Heated Banquet Cart - (128) Plate Capacity, Stainless, 230v/1ph

body-html.p: Transporting plated food from the kitchen to banquet serving areas, the Alto-Shaam 1000-BQ2/128 Halo Heat banquet cart has a large, 128-plate capacity. Wire shelves hold the food, and depending on the application, they can accommodate plates, Gastronorm pans, or banquet trays. Unique heating technology gently surrounds the food and keeps it warm; it doesn't need water, moisture pans, or canned fuel to maintain product temperatures.

The Alto-Shaam 1000-BQ2/128 heated banquet cart is mounted on 6-inch-diameter casters, and because two casters swivel and two are rigid, the cart moves smoothly in a straight line and maneuvers around corners. Operators can steer the unit with transport handles, while the built-in bumpers prevent the cabinet from leaving dents and scratches on other surfaces.

body-html.p: The Alto-Shaam 1000-BQ2/192 Halo Heat banquet cart is designed to move cooked, plated food from the back of the house to banquet halls. It has a large capacity, holding (192) 10-inch plates in two separate sections, and each section has four chrome-plated shelves and individual heat controls. Using up-and-down arrows, operators can adjust the heat in each section and monitor the level on the digital display. Heat in the unit is gentle and doesn't require canned fuel or moisture pans.

Durable for high-volume transport, the Alto-Shaam 1000-BQ2/192 banquet cart has a stainless steel interior and exterior that resists rusting and streamlines the cleaning process. The unit is mounted on six 6-inch casters, with two that swivel and two that are rigid. Guiding the cart is comfortable with transport handles, and the full-perimeter bumper protects doorframes, walls, and furniture from damage.

body-html.p: School cafeterias, hospital kitchens, and banquet halls can use the Alto-Shaam 1000-BQ2/96 heated holding cabinet to keep food warm and ready to serve. The unit uses Halo Heat, a controlled heat source that warms food without changing its texture, taste, or appearance. This heat is distributed throughout the interior for consistent serving temperatures, and operators can adjust the level from 60 to 200 degrees Fahrenheit.

Once the desired level is set, the heat light comes on and the Alto-Shaam 1000-BQ2/96 banquet cart begins heating. After the cart reaches the desired level, the light goes off, signaling it is ready for food. The cabinet can adapt to most banquet holding applications, including covered plates, covered or uncovered plate carriers, and banquet service trays. However, in order to hold the trays and banquet carriers, additional shelving is needed. Because this cart comes with six-inch casters, transporting it is simple; it has side handles for steering and a bumper that prevents accidental wall marks.

body-html.p: The Alto-Shaam 1000-SK/II Halo Heat smoker oven enhances product flavor with smoke from wood chips. It includes six authentic wood chip samples and a 60-minute timer to regulate the smoke. Its Halo Heat provides light, even heat around foods, cooking without it shrinking or losing moisture. For intuitive use, the temperature levels for cook and hold are adjustable with separate control knobs.

After cooking, this Alto-Shaam 1000-SK/II smoker oven holds food at warm serving temperatures and can tenderize meat. Because it transitions into hold mode automatically, it requires little monitoring and can even cook food overnight. It is constructed of stainless steel for durability and swift cleaning. body-html.p: This Alto-Shaam 1000-TH cook-and-hold oven uses Halo Heat technology—a low-temperature system that radiates heat gently throughout the cabinet for cooking and holding. Because it maintains precise temperatures, it can improve food quality, extend hold times, and operate overnight to increase production. Its cooking temperature can be set between 200 and 325 degrees Fahrenheit and its holding temperature range is from 85 to 205 degrees Fahrenheit to accommodate various products. Its cook cycle runs on a timer, and when time runs out, the unit transitions to hold mode automatically, keeping food warm and ready to serve. For consistent product temperatures, heat is distributed throughout the cabinet compartments by Halo Heat technology that is specially designed to prevent shrinkage.

With two compartments, this Alto-Shaam 1000-TH-I cook-and-hold oven can hold eight full-size sheet pans total per oven. Cooking and holding temperatures are programmable from the front using dials, while the timer is adjustable with arrow keys. Indicator lights signal when the unit heats up, cooks, or warms food. product.title: Alto-Shaam 300-TH Countertop Halo Heat Cook and Hold Oven, 120v

body-html.p: Ideal for kitchens with limited space, the Alto-Shaam 300-TH cook-and-hold oven measures 1615⁄16 inches wide by 263⁄16 inches deep by 2013⁄16 inches high to accommodate countertop installation. It's fitted with stabilizing, 3⁄4-inch nonskid rubber feet, and its 1311⁄16-inch-wide by 211⁄2-inch-deep by 121⁄2-inch-high interior accommodates three full-size pans or six half-size pans. Two wire shelves secure the pans in place, while two stainless steel side racks with seven pan positions are spaced on 13⁄8-inch centers. Its solid door withstands heavy use, and the stainless steel construction resists rust and corrosion to preserve its original appearance.

The Alto-Shaam 300-TH cook-and-hold oven's Halo Heat system produces gentle, radiant heat throughout the cabinet evenly without using hot elements, added humidity, or fans that can impact food quality. It generates cooking temperatures between 200 and 325 degrees Fahrenheit, while its holding heat range is 85 to 205 degrees Fahrenheit. Operators can adjust temperatures and download or upload recipes with user-friendly controls. To ensure product is cooked and ready for holding, the single-point, straight probe checks internal product temperatures, converting the oven from cook mode to hold mode automatically.

product.title: Alto-Shaam 300-TH-DLX Countertop Cook and Hold Oven Deluxe Controls, 120v

body-html.p: This Alto-Shaam 300-TH-DLX cook-and-hold oven features deluxe programmable touchscreen controls that enable operators to manipulate temperatures, manage internal product temperatures, and program recipes. Its Halo Heat technology generates heat at a set level between 200 and 325 degrees Fahrenheit for cooking, while its holding temperature range can be adjusted between 85 and 205 degrees Fahrenheit. This system doesn't use fans, added humidity, or extremely hot heating elements to preserve food texture and quality. Warm air surrounds product gently to produce uniform results, and to reduce temperature changes when the door is open, SureTemp heat recovery compensates for heat loss. A straight, single-point probe can gauge product's internal temperature; if it falls within the programmed parameters, the unit switches automatically from cook mode to hold mode.

product.title: Alto-Shaam 500-1D-QS 24.63"W Freestanding Warming Drawer w/ (1) 23" Compartment, 120v

body-html.p: Warming food in a single full-size drawer, the Alto-Shaam 500-1D Halo Heat warming drawer comes with a removable, full-size pan that not only protects the interior from scratches and rust but also streamlines cleaning. Likewise, its stainless steel exterior conveniently wipes clean of dust or splashes, and for flexibility, the unit can be installed freestanding, stacked, or mounted in the counter. This warmer drawer uses Halo Heat technology to warm food without removing moisture. Its temperature is adjustable from 60 to 200 degrees Fahrenheit, and users can check the temperature settings on the LED display.
